```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(rvest)
library(httr)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r }
url = "http://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm"

drug_use_html = read_html(url)


```

Get the pieces that you really need.
```{r}
table_marj = 
  drug_use_html |> 
  html_table() |> 
  first() |>
  slice(-1)  #cleaning the NOTE row (on the top of the whole table)
```

Read in cost of living
```{r ex.1}
cost_html = read_html("https://www.bestplaces.net/cost_of_living/city/new_york/new_york")
table_cost = 
  cost_html |>
  html_table(header = TRUE) |>
  first()
  
```
